One-Click-Copy Enhanced: Elevate Your Clipboard Experience with Version 2.2.1

Say goodbye to cumbersome clipboard management and welcome enhanced convenience with "One-Click-Copy Enhanced." This latest update brings a fresh look and improved functionality, making it easier than ever to manage your text snippets efficiently.

Key Features of One-Click-Copy Enhanced:
• Quick Clipboard Access: Utilize the ever-visible "Copy" button next to each text snippet for one-click copying to your clipboard.
• Simplified Snippet Management: Seamlessly edit, delete, or add new snippets via the extension popup or through the handy pop-out window.
• Drag-and-Drop Sorting: Enabled drag-and-drop functionality for text snippets, allowing users to reorder them easily.
• Flexible Pop-out Window: Our pop-out window feature allows you to use "One-Click-Copy Enhanced" even when you're not in your browser, making it easy to manage and use your snippets across different applications and tasks.
• Device Sync: Keep your text snippets consistent across all your Chrome devices.
• Data Privacy: Your snippets are yours alone. We do not collect any personal data or text snippets.
• Backup/Restore: Export/Import as .JSON or .CSV file.

How to Use:
1. Click the "One-Click-Copy Enhanced" icon next to your address bar to open the extension.
2. Add new text snippets with the "Add New Text" button.
3. Use the "Edit" and "Copy" buttons for straightforward snippet management.
4. Manage snippet deletion individually or in bulk with the "Delete Text" button and selection checkboxes.

Tips:
• Optimized for Multitasking: For Windows users with smaller screens, we recommend using Microsoft PowerToys' "Always On Top" feature to pin the "One-Click-Copy Enhanced" pop-out window. This allows you to keep your snippets visible and accessible while working across different applications. Enhance your productivity by downloading PowerToys at Github: https://github.com/microsoft/PowerToys

Experience the new era of clipboard convenience with Version 2.2.1 of "One-Click-Copy Enhanced." Clipboard management has never been more intuitive or efficient. Say goodbye to the old ways of copying and pasting and embrace enhanced functionality and ease of use!

Changelog:

What's New in v2.2.1:
1. New Features Added:
• Drag-and-Drop Sorting
• Added support for export/import as JSON
• New Backup/Restore UI: Combined JSON and CSV export/import operations in a modal window.
2. Enhancements:
• Improved performance of the zebra-style background for drag-and-drop sorting.
• Updated the appearance of buttons for better visibility.
• Added tooltips to guide new users when no text snippets are present.
• Minor Bug Fixes:

What's New in v2.1.2:
• Minor Bug Fix: Fixed an icon display issue.

What's New in v2.1.1:
• Minor Bug Fix: Fixed a bug where text snippets containing double quotes were cut off during the Export/Import process and icon issue.

What's New in v2.1.0:
• Name Update: We've evolved from "One-Click-Copy 2" to "One-Click-Copy Enhanced" to better reflect the upgraded features and user experience.
• Enhanced Readability: Each row now features a zebra-style background color, enhancing readability and making it easier to manage multiple snippets at a glance.
• Bug Fix: Previously, text snippets containing commas were cut off when using the Export/Import functionality due to CSV misinterpretation of commas as separators. This has been corrected, ensuring all your text remains intact during backup operations.
